tool_description:
binlist.net is a public web service for searching Issuer Identification Numbers (IIN).

The first 6 digits of a credit card number are known as the Issuer Identification Number (IIN), previously known as Bank Identification Number (BIN). These identify the institution that issued the card to the card holder.
name: Binlist
title: Binlist

api_list.name: JSON
api_list.description: Get issuing bank information in JSON format

required_parameters.name: bin
required_parameters.description: BIN/IIN number of the issuing bank

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://binlist.p.rapidapi.com/json/429503"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binlist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://binlist.p.rapidapi.com/json/{bin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "binlist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
